entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Clearing near midnight. Fog at times overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Fog at times in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 10 May 2023
